name: Nine Lives - Ludam Dare 44
description:
PLEASE MAKE FULLSCREEN!!!

A difficult platformer where when you die, you produce a halo above your head that can that be jumped on. You have to navigate many difficult skill and puzzle levels. There are many power-ups (extra lives, buttons, gravity manipulators, checkpoints, lazers, ect.) and 4 worlds; grass, desert, winter, and space.

Controls:

Controls are WASD to move or arrow keys. Left click to die which will spawn a halo if you have enough lives. Right click to restart. H for a hint.
